Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the lantibiotics family (Class I bacteriocin)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Structure Description: Tandem MS analysis identified two sequence tags (Dhb-PGCAK/Q-Dhb-G and I/L-Dhb-Dha-H [due to the use of CID, Dha/Dhb represents either a dehydrated amino acid or a site of thioether bridge cleavage]) that matched the deduced amino acid sequence of BsaA2.Thioether bonds between residues 3 and 7, 8-11, 16-21, and 19-22.
Sequence Information.Comments: This bacteriocin is identical to staphylococcin Au-26 initially reported in 1992.

Literature.Title: Production of the Bsa lantibiotic by community-acquired Staphylococcus aureus strains.
Literature.Author: Daly KM, Upton M, Sandiford SK, Draper LA, Wescombe PA, Jack RW, O'Connor PM, Rossney A, G?tz F, Hill C, Cotter PD, Ross RP, Tagg JR.
